title: I have done the arcade mission and didn't get the arcade icon
body: i played one matchmade game and won,but i didn't get the icon.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Some of those icons took their sweet time on their way to your accounts, but they should have all showed up by now! Please let me know if you still don't have yours though and I can get that straightened out!
I finished the last missions 3-4 days ago but I still haven't received an icon from any of the missions {{item:3070}}
Double checked for you, and this account does already have the New Level Icon from completing that first mission. It looks like you already have it equipped actually!
maybe it's because the arcade map wasn't up yet? er Idk
I have the same issue, and it says the mission is complete but when i check my icons it is nowhere to be found.
Same, 3 of my friends and I did the mission and we haven't gotten anything from it
Same ._. also i bought a Mini-dungeon pass and didnt get a ward skin or even bonus Tickets {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
